tudarmstadt.lt.ABSentiment.uimahelper

Class Preprocessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • tudarmstadt.lt.ABSentiment.training.util.ProblemBuilder
      • tudarmstadt.lt.ABSentiment.uimahelper.Preprocessor

  • public class Preprocessor
extends ProblemBuilder
    Preprocessor class that performs NLP operations using UIMA AnalysisEngines.
